text: Ștefan Ioan Tofan (born February 25, 1965) in Huși, is a former Romanian rugby union football player. He played as a centre. ==Club career== Tofan played for Dinamo București during his career.Asociația Internaționalilor de Rugby România - Tofan Ioan Ștefan ==International career== Tofan gathered 20 caps for Romania, from his debut in 1985 to his last game in 1994. He scored 2 conversions during his international career, 4 points on aggregate. He was a member of his national side for the 1st and 2nd Rugby World Cups in 1987 and 1991 and played in 3 group matches in 1987.Ștefan Tofan Career Figures at ESPN Scrum ==Honours== ;Dinamo București * Divizia Națională: 1990-91, 1993–94 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian rugby union players Category:Romania international rugby union players Category:CS Dinamo București (rugby) players Category:Rugby union centres Category:People from Huși
title: Ștefan Tofan
